com.facebook.react.turbomodule.core.interfaces

接口 TurboModuleRegistry

  • 所有已知实现类:
    TurboModuleManager

    public interface TurboModuleRegistry
    Interface to allow for creating and retrieving TurboModules.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEagerInitModuleNames()
      Return the names of all the NativeModules that are supposed to be eagerly initialized.
      TurboModule getModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
      Return the TurboModule instance that has that name `moduleName`.
      java.util.Collection<TurboModule> getModules()
      Get all instantiated TurboModules.
      boolean hasModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
      Has the TurboModule with name `moduleName` been instantiated?

    • 方法详细资料

      • getModule

        TurboModule getModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
        Return the TurboModule instance that has that name `moduleName`. If the `moduleName` TurboModule hasn't been instantiated, instantiate it. If no TurboModule is registered under `moduleName`, return null.

      • getModules

        java.util.Collection<TurboModule> getModules()
        Get all instantiated TurboModules.

      • hasModule

        boolean hasModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
        Has the TurboModule with name `moduleName` been instantiated?

      • getEagerInitModuleNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEagerInitModuleNames()
        Return the names of all the NativeModules that are supposed to be eagerly initialized. By calling getModule on each name, this allows the application to eagerly initialize its NativeModules.
